3 strategies that will lead to success for early-stage startups

Build in public Be customer-centric Engage with related communities

We have consistently enjoyed the results of implementing these strategies.

If you have a better strategy, share it with us.
stories.title: Strategies that will lead to success for early-stage startups

stories.text:
I have my thesis defense presentation in a week and it's being done over Microsoft Teams. I see there is a mode called Presenter View for PowerPoint presentation which makes it possible for the presenter to see the notes on each slide but the audience only see the presentation.

However, my presentation is made in LaTeX beamer and I have a PDF. I was looking for a suggestion so I can emulate the Presenter View where I can read my notes without sharing the whole screen.
stories.title: Ask HN: Microsoft Teams “Presenter View” PDF Presentation
